## CountryInformationQuery type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CountryInformationQuery = {
    country?: Maybe<{
        id?: Maybe<string>;
        two_letter_abbreviation?: Maybe<string>;
        full_name_locale?: Maybe<string>;
        full_name_english?: Maybe<string>;
        available_regions?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<{
            id?: Maybe<number>;
            code?: Maybe<string>;
            name?: Maybe<string>;
        }>>>;
    }>;
};
```
